command.name: command
command.doc: A command to be executed of this task. The expected return code is 0.

task_work_path.name: task_work_path
task_work_path.doc: The dir where the command to be executed.

forward_files.name: forward_files
forward_files.doc: The files to be uploaded in task_work_path before the task exectued.

backward_files.name: backward_files
backward_files.doc: The files to be download to local_root in task_work_path after the task finished

outlog.name: outlog
outlog.doc: The out log file name. redirect from stdout

errlog.name: errlog
errlog.doc: The err log file name. redirect from stderr
